text: He kitaba vali'o! Tuhade kola sada rasula a'i'a hai ate tuhanu uha sapasata khabaram de riha hai, rasulam de ika atarala (paigabaram de a'una di lari jo lame samem taka tuti ho'i si) de ba'ada. Tam ki tusim iha na kaho ki sade kola ko'i cagi khabara suna'una vala ate dara dena vala a'i'a hi nahim. Isa la'i huna tuhade kola cagi khabara dena vala ate dara'una vala a gi'a hai ate alaha nu hara ciza di samaratha prapata hai
